content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. Based on the size of the apartment and the location, I am looking for a monthly rent of 1,200 Euros. However, I am open to negotiation and would be willing to consider a lower rent if the tenant is willing to sign a longer lease term. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to negotiate the rental price. Can you please provide me with more information about the location and the size of the apartment?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Certainly, Ryanah. The apartment is located in the heart of Mannheim, close to public transportation and many shops and restaurants. It has 25 square meters of living space and includes a small kitchen, a living room, and a bedroom. The building also has a shared bathroom and a common area for residents. I believe the location and size of the apartment make it a great option for someone looking for an affordable and convenient place to live in Mannheim.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1,200 Euros per month.
TERMINATE
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Ryanah. I am glad that we were able to reach an agreement on the rental price. I look forward to hearing from you soon to finalize the details of the lease.
name: Heinrich Heine
